environnement
Interface Contraintes

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContraintesSolitaire, AbstractMember, Arm, Arm3, ArmFromAbstract, ArmN, ElementaryMultiAgentContraintes, ElementaryMuscleContraintes, ElementaryMuscleTiling
public interface Contraintes
extends Serializable

The game's rules :

  • Gives the list of possible actions from a given state.
  • Computes the next state, given a start state and an action.
  • Knows when a state is final.
  • Knows whether a state is a winning one.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)

whoWins

int whoWins(State s)
Who won ?
  • Two-players game :
    • Player One : -1
    • Tie : 0
    • Player Two : 1
  • Single-player game :
    • Win : -1
    • Null: 0
    • Loose: 1
